history.proof: split. - intros H. split. + destruct (Nat.eq_0_gt_0_cases n) as [Hn0|Hn0]. * auto. * exfalso. qsimpl time: 1 use: power_S. qsimpl time: 1 use: power_S. qsimpl time: 1 use: power_S. qsimpl time: 1 use: power_S. hfcrush use: Nat.sub_diag, Nat.lt_asymm, power_ge_1, S_pred_pos, lt_O_minus_lt unfold: lt, mscal. + destruct (Nat.eq_0_gt_0_cases p) as [Hp0|Hp0]. * rewrite Hp0 in H. qsimpl time: 1 use: power_S. * qsimpl time: 1 use: power_S. - intros [H1 H2]. rewrite H1. symmetry. qsimpl time: 1 use: power_of_0,power_S. sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: split. - intros H. split. + destruct (Nat.eq_0_gt_0_cases n) as [Hn0|Hn0]. * auto. * exfalso. apply Nat.lt_0_mul in Hn0 as [H1 H2]. rewrite power_S in H. apply Nat.lt_0_mul' in H1 as [H1 _]. apply Nat.lt_0_mul' in H2 as [_ H2]. apply Nat.mul_pos_cancel_l in H2; auto. + destruct (Nat.eq_0_gt_0_cases p) as [Hp0|Hp0]. * rewrite Hp0 in H. now rewrite Nat.mul_0_l in H. * apply Nat.eq_0_gt_0_cases in Hp0 as [|]; try auto. exfalso. apply Hp0, Nat.neq_0_lt_0, power2_gt_0. - intros [H1 H2]. rewrite H1. symmetry. apply power_of_0, H2.
